# ChangeLog
## v5.6.0
* NODE-5100: Migrate from `gc-stats` to `perf_hook` for collecting GC stats

## v5.5.2
* NODE-5096: Removed code for `couchbase`, `mongodb` and `dukes-client` to avoid app crash for accidental dependencies, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-5096

## v5.5.1
* Fix security issue for gc-stats

## v5.2.2
* NODE-3479: Change the oom_x and restart_x file location to logs folder

## v5.2.1
* Fix: security vulnerability, https://jirap.corp.ebay.com/browse/NODE-3315

## v5.2.0
* Migrate emitter from Monitor to process for metrics

## v4.2.0
* Fixed: Removed `usage` as it is not compatible with Node 14.x

## v4.1.0/5.0.0
* Removed sherlock frontier client as Sherlock team is no more supporting metrics via frontier client.
* Switched CPU reporting from 3rd party module to native node process.cpuUsage
* Added an option to collect overall CPU usage of the system for cases when node uses external module/app which CPU usage is not captured with default metrics collection. Example can be a use of headless browser chromium to generate screenshots.

## v4.0.0
* Remove peer and unwanted dependencies and upgrade dependencies

## v0.0.94
* errorCount should be reported to CAL as original number of errors per reporting period, it should not be averaged per second.

## v0.0.93
* Added `eps` metrics to include CAL errors and HTTP Errors
* Added Security metrics like `csrf`/`xss`/`redirect` etc to Sherlock

## v0.0.92
* Refactored email alerting and added Restart Metrics to Sherlock

## v0.0.91
* Fixed `uncaught` error when SMTP server throws Error
* Issue # https://github.corp.ebay.com/nodejs/monitor-inc/issues/46

## v0.0.90
* Added Out of Memory Email Alert

## v0.0.87
* Fixed: Added default tooBusy handler
* Removed unused dependencies
* Fixed: avoid graceful shutdown on CTRL+C in dev mode to speed up restart
* Added more details in crash email

## v0.0.86
* Fixed failed tests as per https://github.com/nodejs/node/wiki/API-changes-between-v0.10-and-v0.12#signal-handling

## v0.0.85
* Node 4.0 - Upgraded `heapdump` & `usage` versions and switched `gc-stats` to open source version

## v0.0.84
* Fixed: should control exit process only when in non-Dev mode or when kraken is not yet engaged before first request

## v0.0.83
* Added: sending crash email to owner

## v0.0.82
* Fixed: should gracefully exit due to memory leak.

## v0.0.81
* should allow to run middleware in more than one route at the same time.
* fixed: shedLoad should not cause app restart due to headersSent

## v0.0.80
* Fixed default email DL to end with '@corp.ebay.com' in order to work in production environment.

## v0.0.78
* Fixed: should not control exiting process as it is done by krakenjs.

## v0.0.77
* Enhancement: Increase tail number of lines for the log files attached to the email
* Fixed : Added test cases for email

## v0.0.76
* Fixed: Exception of unable to postmetrics when FC is not established.

## v0.0.75
* Added environment to the subject of crash emails

## v0.0.74
 - using `DL-eBay-NodeJS-LiveMonitoring` DL for eBay Node.js monitoring.
